### Conflicts
No conflicts as of last run.
utACK 4057b7acb7125739537078d026ad96bb21708e3c\nRemoves three #ifdefs, probably very tiny ressource reduction when not running with the wallet.
This is not necessary, it is safe to `delete nullptr`.
Or maybe you want to get rid of these `delete` as these objects are owned by `BitcoinApplication` instance.
Failing to create a `PaymentServer` object is not critical, IMO.
> Or maybe you want to get rid of these `delete` as these objects are owned by `BitcoinApplication` instance.\n\nExactly!
Also `new` will never return a `nullptr` anyway.
